title: Create a Simple HTML Page
description:
Build a basic HTML page with a title and paragraph. ## Requirements 1. Create a valid HTML5 document structure 2. Set the page title to "My First Page" 3. Add an `

` heading with the text "Hello, World!" 4. Add a `

` paragraph with any introduction text ## Expected Structure Your page should have: - A `` declaration - An `` element with `lang="en"` - A `` with charset, viewport, and title - A `` with an h1 and a paragraph

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <!-- Add your title here -->
</head>
<body>
    <!-- Add your heading and paragraph here -->
</body>
</html>
